metadata.description: (Desire) - An iridescent heart, shimmering with a rainbow of colors, beats with a steady and mesmerizing rhythm. It is a symbol of love and life, pulsing with energy and vitality. The circles of metal are like a never-ending embrace, holding the iridescent heart secure, and representing the unbreakable bond of love that surrounds it. The repeated circular motion is a symbol of the constant cycle of life, and the endless flow of love between two souls.
metadata.name: VOGUESGx8SIAN DESIRE #1
